title: QR Studio ‚Äì Scan & Create QR
description:
Full description:

QR Studio is a fast, powerful QR Code Scanner and QR Code Generator built for everyday use. Scan QR codes instantly, create custom QR codes, and manage everything with smart history and collections ‚Äî all in one modern app.

If you're looking for a reliable QR scanner, QR reader, or QR maker, QR Studio gives you speed, simplicity, and full control.

üîç FAST QR CODE SCANNER
‚Ä¢ Real-time QR code scanning
‚Ä¢ Scan QR code from camera or gallery
‚Ä¢ WiFi QR scanner with instant connect option
‚Ä¢ UPI QR scanner with quick payment support
‚Ä¢ Smart QR reader with automatic content detection
‚Ä¢ Flashlight support for low light environments

üéØ SMART QR READER ACTIONS
QR Studio automatically detects QR type and shows relevant actions:
‚Ä¢ Open website links
‚Ä¢ Connect to WiFi networks
‚Ä¢ Make UPI payments
‚Ä¢ Call phone numbers
‚Ä¢ Send SMS messages
‚Ä¢ Save contact cards (vCard)
‚Ä¢ Compose emails

üìÇ QR HISTORY & COLLECTIONS
‚Ä¢ Automatically saves scanned and generated QR codes
‚Ä¢ Organize with custom collections
‚Ä¢ Add one QR code to multiple collections
‚Ä¢ Full-text search
‚Ä¢ Filter by collection
‚Ä¢ Swipe to delete with Undo
‚Ä¢ Storage limit indicator (Free & Pro)

üé® QR CODE GENERATOR & QR MAKER
Create QR codes for:
‚Ä¢ Website (URL)
‚Ä¢ WiFi network (SSID & password)
‚Ä¢ Email
‚Ä¢ Phone number
‚Ä¢ SMS
‚Ä¢ Contact card
‚Ä¢ UPI payment
‚Ä¢ Plain text

Customize your QR code design:
‚Ä¢ Foreground & background colors
‚Ä¢ Logo overlay (Pro)
‚Ä¢ High-resolution QR code export
‚Ä¢ Save to gallery
‚Ä¢ Share QR image instantly

Whether you need a QR code generator for business, a WiFi QR maker for home, or a simple QR scanner app for daily use, QR Studio makes it easy.

üîê PRIVATE & OFFLINE
‚Ä¢ Works completely offline
‚Ä¢ No unnecessary permissions
‚Ä¢ Your QR code data stays on your device

‚≠ê PRO VERSION
‚Ä¢ Ad-free QR scanner experience
‚Ä¢ Unlimited scan history
‚Ä¢ Unlimited collections
‚Ä¢ Custom QR colors & logo branding
‚Ä¢ Priority support

QR Studio is your all-in-one QR code scanner, QR reader, and QR code generator.

Download QR Studio today and scan, create, and organize QR codes effortlessly.
